Job Title: Private Equity Analyst

Location: New York City Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Company OverviewAugment Jobs leverages its software, recruiting expertise, and extensive network to automate the recruitment process for job seekers. The company partners with full-time employees, licensed recruiters, and employers to help job seekers navigate the oversaturated job market. Augment Jobs sources job opportunities for its clients and submits applications on their behalf once the clients approve the role. Augment Jobs clients save hundreds of hours on applications and focus their efforts on leveraging the platform to prepare for interviews.
Submit a staffing application to our recruiting team at https://airtable.com/appK6gxCEphlasWY6/shrA31a5FXCWvZAVd. 
Core ValuesClient Outcomes: We exhibit empathy on the nature of the job search process and include a Job Guarantee to ensure every client leaves Augment Jobs with a new job or promotion after working with us.Integrity: We represent our clients to employers and recruiters with the utmost honesty and transparency. This extends to all of our employees and clients who work with us. We work with candidates who accurately represent themselves and have an honor code.Partnership: We are committed to building and maintaining long-term relationships with our clients, coaches, and community.Education: We continuously learn and adapt to changing market conditions and inform our clients in real time on how to stand out in the job application process. Our clients can apply what they learn at Augment Jobs for the rest of their careers.Giving Back: We host free career consultations to build community and create accessibility.
Overview:We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Private Equity Analyst to join our dynamic team. As a Private Equity Analyst, you will play a critical role in evaluating investment opportunities, conducting financial analysis, and supporting the overall investment decision-making process. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, financial modeling expertise, and a keen understanding of the private equity landscape.Responsibilities:Financial Analysis:Conduct comprehensive financial analysis, including building and maintaining complex financial models to evaluate potential investment opportunities.Analyze historical and projected financial statements, cash flow, and valuation metrics.Due Diligence:Perform due diligence on target companies, assessing industry dynamics, competitive positioning, and growth prospects.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze relevant information.Market Research:Stay abreast of industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities.Prepare market research reports to inform investment strategies and decisions.Investment Memo Preparation:Prepare detailed investment memoranda, outlining the investment thesis, risks, and potential returns.Present findings and recommendations to senior management and investment committees.Deal Execution:Assist in the execution of investment transactions, including mergers and acquisitions, leveraged buyouts, and recapitalizations.Coordinate due diligence processes and work with legal and financial advisors.Portfolio Management:Monitor and report on the performance of existing portfolio companies.Work closely with portfolio management teams to identify value creation opportunities.Valuation and Exit Strategies:Participate in the valuation of portfolio companies and assess potential exit strategies.Evaluate exit opportunities, such as IPOs, secondary sales, and strategic exits.Risk Management:Identify and assess investment risks, proposing strategies to mitigate risks and enhance returns.Stay informed about regulatory changes and their potential impact on investments.
Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business, or a related field; CFA or MBA is a plus.Previous experience in private equity, investment banking, or a related field.Strong financial modeling and valuation skills.Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities.Effective communication and presentation skills.Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.Proven ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.
Learn More:https://www.augmentjobs.com/

Experience Level (if available): None
